Name: Adventurer's Bandana
Title: Trail-Tramper: Adventurer's Bandana
Desc: "All the secrets of the stars and the abyss await discovery by mere mortals."

Talent.Name: Adventurer's Bandana
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses a Normal Attack:</color> Heal self for 1 HP. (Max 3 times per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
